forms.referenceInitialCapital: Initial capital for reference loan investment
forms.alternativeInitialCapital: Initial capital for alternative loan investment
forms.bulletLoanInfo: For bullet loans, principal will be paid in the final month.
forms.modularLoanInfo: For modular loans, specify when principal payments will be made.

charts.investmentGrowth: Investment Growth & Net Worth Over Time

investment.netWorthEndOfTerm: Net Worth at End of Term
investment.minimumAnnualReturn: Minimum annual return needed to cover the final loan payment
investment.profitableDescription: Based on the simulation, the investment strategy with the {{loanType}} loan results in a positive net worth of {{netWorth}} at the end of the term.
investment.riskyDescription: Based on the simulation, the investment strategy with the {{loanType}} loan results in a negative net worth of {{netWorth}} at the end of the term.
investment.growthRateExceeds: The annual growth rate of {{growthRate}}% exceeds the minimum required rate of {{requiredRate}}%.
investment.growthRateBelow: The annual growth rate of {{growthRate}}% is below the minimum required rate of {{requiredRate}}%.
investment.marketVolatility: Market volatility could result in lower actual returns
investment.interestRateChange: Interest rates may change over the loan term
investment.taxConsiderations: This simulation doesn't account for taxes on investment gains
investment.additionalContributions: Additional contributions or withdrawals aren't modeled
investment.howItWorksDescription1: This simulation compares a reference loan (typically an annuity) with an alternative loan (typically a bullet loan), while investing the monthly payment differences.
investment.howItWorksDescription2: The goal is to see if investing the payment differences generates enough returns to cover the bullet payment at the end of the term.

comparison.alternativeSavesMoneyDesc: Based on the comparison, the {{loanType}} loan offers better value with total savings of {{savings}}.
comparison.referenceSavesMoneyDesc: Based on the comparison, the {{loanType}} loan offers better value with total savings of {{savings}}.
comparison.paymentStructure: Consider if the different payment structure fits your financial situation.
comparison.traditionalStructure: The traditional structure provides better long-term value in this case.
comparison.investmentQuestion: Want to see how investing the difference could change this comparison?

placeholders.singleLoanPlaceholder: Enter your loan parameters in the form and click "Calculate Loan" to see the results.
placeholders.comparisonPlaceholder: Update the loan parameters for both loans and click "Compare Loans" to see a detailed comparison.
placeholders.investmentPlaceholder: Configure the loan parameters and investment settings, then click "Run Investment Simulation" to see the results.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.quote1: LoanLogic helped me understand exactly how different loan options would impact my finances over time. I saved thousands by making a more informed decision.
testimonials.quote2: As a financial advisor, I use LoanLogic with all my clients. The visualization tools make it so much easier to explain complex loan concepts and help clients make better decisions.
testimonials.quote3: The investment simulation feature is a game-changer. Being able to compare different loan strategies and seeing how they affect my investment portfolio made a complex decision simple.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan later?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. If you upgrade, you'll be charged the prorated difference. If you downgrade, you'll receive credit towards your next billing cycle.
faq.question2: Do you offer discounts for financial advisors or brokers?
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer volume discounts for financial professionals who need multiple accounts. Please contact our sales team for more information on our professional packages.
faq.question3: How are qualified leads defined for advertisers?
faq.answer3: Qualified leads are users who have completed a loan calculation matching your target criteria and have explicitly expressed interest in receiving more information about financing options.
faq.question4: Is there a trial period available?
faq.answer4: We offer a 14-day free trial of our Pro plan so you can experience all the advanced features before committing. No credit card required to start your trial.
faq.question5: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer5: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings page. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.

cta.title: Ready to get started with LoanLogic?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users making smarter financial decisions with our powerful loan visualization tools.

about.title: About LoanLogic
about.subtitle: Empowering users with powerful tools to make better financial decisions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At LoanLogic, we believe that financial decisions should be made with complete transparency and understanding. Our mission is to demystify complex loan structures and empower individuals to make informed choices about their financial future.
mission.paragraph2: We've developed powerful visualization tools that make it easy to see exactly how different loan options affect your finances over time, allowing you to compare scenarios and find the option that best fits your unique situation.
mission.description: We strive to make advertising more accessible, effective and transparent for businesses of all sizes.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: LoanLogic started in 2022 when our founders, frustrated by the lack of transparency in mortgage calculations, set out to create a tool that would make complex financial decisions clear and accessible to everyone.

growth.title: Growth & Development
growth.description: Over the years, we've expanded our functionality to include investment simulations, insurance approximation, and advanced comparison tools. Our user base has grown to include not just individuals, but financial advisors and mortgage brokers.

today.title: Today & Beyond
today.description: Today, LoanLogic helps thousands of users make better financial decisions. We continue to innovate with new features like multi-client management, case systems, and integrations with financial institutions.

member1.bio: Former financial advisor with 15+ years of experience in the mortgage industry.

member2.bio: Software engineer with expertise in fintech and data visualization.

member3.bio: Product designer focused on creating intuitive financial tools for non-experts.

member4.bio: Marketing strategist with a background in financial education and consumer advocacy.

cta.title: Join us in revolutionizing financial decision-making
cta.subtitle: Experience the power of clear, visual loan comparisons and make your next financial decision with confidence.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We're here to help you make the most of LoanLogic.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

location.title: Our Location
location.mapPlaceholder: Map would be displayed here in production.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What is your typical response time?
faq.answer1: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For technical support, our premium users receive priority service with responses typically within 4 hours.
faq.question2: How can I report a technical issue?
faq.answer2: You can report technical issues through this contact form by selecting "Technical Support" from the category dropdown. Please include as much detail as possible, including browser type, device, and steps to reproduce the issue.
faq.question3: I'm interested in advertising on LoanLogic. How do I get started?
faq.answer3: Select "Advertising" from the category dropdown in the contact form, and our advertising team will get in touch with you. You can also check our pricing page for information on our advertising packages.

features.title: Powerful Loan Visualization Features
features.subtitle: Explore the tools that make LoanLogic the ultimate loan calculation and comparison platform.

loanCalculator.title: Comprehensive Loan Calculator
loanCalculator.description1: Our advanced calculator handles multiple loan types including annuity, bullet, and modular loans with customizable parameters for complete flexibility.
loanCalculator.description2: Input your specific loan parameters and instantly see how changes affect your monthly payments, total interest, and overall loan costs.

chart1.title: Loan Balance Over Time
chart1.description: Watch your loan balance decrease over time with our interactive chart. Visualize the impact of extra payments and see exactly when your loan will be paid off.

chart2.title: Payment Breakdown
chart2.description: See exactly how your payments are distributed between principal, interest, and insurance with our detailed breakdown charts. Understand where your money is going each month.

chart3.title: Amortization Schedule
chart3.description: Access a complete month-by-month breakdown of your loan payments with our detailed amortization tables. Filter and sort to find the information you need quickly.

chart4.title: Loan Comparison
chart4.description: Compare multiple loan scenarios side-by-side to identify the best option for your needs. Visualize differences in monthly payments, total costs, and payoff timelines.

chart5.title: Investment Simulation
chart5.description: Simulate how investing alongside your loan payments can impact your overall financial position. Find the optimal balance between paying down debt and growing your investments.

chart6.title: Insurance Approximator
chart6.description: Estimate life and home insurance costs based on your personal information and loan details. Visualize how insurance affects your total loan costs over time.

advanced.title: Advanced Features for Professionals
advanced.description1: LoanLogic includes specialized tools for financial advisors, mortgage brokers, and other professionals who need to manage multiple clients and cases.
advanced.description2: Our case management system allows you to organize all your client information, loan simulations, and documents in one secure location.
advanced.security: Secure, scalable, and built for businesses of all sizes.

export.title: Export Options
export.description: Export your calculations and visualizations in multiple formats for sharing or record-keeping.

api.title: API Integration
api.description: Integrate LoanLogic calculations directly into your own applications using our robust API.

sharing.title: Sharing & Collaboration
sharing.description: Share your calculations and reports with clients, colleagues, or partners for collaborative decision-making.

accessibility.title: Accessibility & Customization
accessibility.description1: LoanLogic is built with accessibility in mind, ensuring that everyone can use our tools regardless of their abilities or preferences.
accessibility.description2: Customize your experience with different languages, themes, and display options to suit your specific needs.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: Your financial data is protected with industry-leading security measures. We use encryption, secure data storage, and regular security audits to keep your information safe.

privacy.title: Privacy Controls
privacy.description: We respect your privacy and give you control over your data. Choose what information to share and with whom through our granular privacy settings.
